name: Reproducible Research with GPU-Jupyter: Fine-tuning ResNet
description: This repository demonstrates a reproducible deep learning experiment using GPU-Jupyter to fine-tune a ResNet model on the EuroSAT dataset. The full computational environment is encapsulated in a container based on GPU-Jupyter.

inputs.description: EuroSAT dataset is automatically downloaded by executing the notebook.

execution.instructions: Execute the notebook from start to end to download input data and generate results.
